streetlife: this is the place where thugs is born in the hood – blink to long ya life is gone in the hood – convicts still live with they mom and they whole family tree is tattooed on they arm in the hood – crack fiendsll furnish a llac in the hood – africans be drivin cabs in the hood – in the streets the ghetto is hot and the illest gangsters on the block with cops in the hood – the ones you lovell fill you with slugs in the hood – babies born addicted to drugs in the hood – we make life or death decisions and the school system is like a minimal prison so you cant knock the hustle or the life that im livin in the hood – it aint all good repent or you sinnin
